meta.description: Dr. Pierre Kory visits The Jimmy Dore Show for the first time for an eye-opening and pointed interview on vaccine injury.

title: “The Vaccine Injured have been Abandoned”
cleaned_text: “The vaccine injured have been abandoned,” FLCCC Chief Medical Officer, Dr. Pierre Kory, tells The Jimmy Dore Show. Watch the eye-opening interview in its entirety here.
